title: New Rengar Skin
body:
Hi all!

I've main'd a bit of Rengar over the last year and I've noticed he only has two 975 skins. Rengar is such an awesome champion and is certainly up there with all the other popular champs so I think he deserves another skin. Maybe one that really changes his animations and visuals quite a bit. A legendary skin maybe? I have an idea for one:

Shadow realm Rengar/Dark Assassin Rengar

Rengars eye patch is replaced with a black, red, evil eye and his knife becomes a long,black scimitar. His body is covered in a dark metallic coat with his claws becoming sharp knives. His Q animation would possess his scimitar with dark energies which would release onto the victim, his W would shroud him in red eternal anger which would explode around him, his E would throw sharp, two ended knives which would wrap around the victim paralysing them in darkness. And his Ultimate would shroud him in darkness as he hunts for his prey and they hear his grim laughter as death approaches.

replies.body: I would like another skin for Rengar, myself, as I kinda main him too :D
I want a cute kitty Rengar, cuter then Gnar
Kitty Cat Rengar. Rengar is now a giant kitten and his E becomes a ball of yarn.

> [{quoted}](name=KoiSarina,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=avif0qsO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-23T19:42:38.055+0000)
>
> Kitty Cat Rengar. Rengar is now a giant kitten and his E becomes a ball of yarn.

Either this or Cheerleader Rengar and he throws pompoms.
